instruction: Emit SCX lines to achieve the described intent.
input: Intent: update UI, persist settings, route to agent, and log the action.
output:
#faction_nomads (>) ^mx2php "assist task"
!ui (>) "warn:low-health"
!ui (>) "notify:success"
#faction_reapers (>) ^janus "plan task"

instruction: Define SCX for a checkout flow with auth, cart, quote, pay, and log.
Create a minimal ASXR HTML that mounts nav, grid, and holotape dock.
output:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/atomic.css">
    <script src="asx-runtime.js" defer></script>
  </head>
  <body class="bg-dark pad-lg">
    <asx-block id="nav-bar"></asx-block>
    <asx-block id="two-col-grid"></asx-block>
    <asx-block id="holotape-dock"></asx-block>
  </body>
</html>
